names.pharmaceuticalLatin: Semen Lablab Album Semen Dolichorus Lablab

category: Herbs that Clean Heat and Purge Fire

indications: Summerheat with pronounced or chronic diarrhea, dysentery, nausea, vomiting and loud borborygmus

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with intermittent fevers and chills.
The prepared form is preferred as the raw form is considered toxic.

useCases: Sudden turmoil disorder due to smoldering Summer Heat and Dampness.
Diarrhea or vaginal discharge due to Spleen Deficiency.
Spleen and Stomach Deficiency with Dampness.
Slight Deficiency of the Spleen and Stomach.

notes: Its main use is for digestive ailments related to ingestion of contaminated food and drink (Summerheat), summer colds and alcoholic intoxication.
This herb can be used alone to treat poultry poisoning, calomel poisoning or powdered for arsenic poisoning.
It is said that snakebites can be cured with External application of the smashed leaves of this herb.
To treat spasms that occur after vomiting or diarrhea, add a little vinegar to a handful of smashed leaves of this herb, squeeze out the juice and apply it to the affected area.
It is said that this herb cures Spleen and Stomach Deficiency with nausea, regurgitation, chronic diarrhea, dyspepsia, abdominal masses and infantile malnutrition.
This herb has been shown to inhibit the growth of cancer cells.
It is said that Stomach cancer and other tumors can be with the juice extracted from 750g of the leaves of this herb. Take frequently without dosage restriction.
Lablab Testa Bian Dou Yi is the dried capsule of the hyacinth bean. It regulates the function of the Stomach and Spleen when diarrhea occur in the summer. Its dosage is 6-12g.

Flos Lablab Bian Dou Hua is the dried flower of the hyacinth bean. It relieves Summerheat, removes Dampness and controls bleeding and is used to treat dysentery, diarrhea and leukorrhea. Its dosage is 6-12g.
